title: E291 Router Hauntings and Our Weekly World News Broadcasting Voices
description:
It's episode 291 and we love the theatrics! This week Em brings us the wild tale of Batsquatch, who may just come with their own cryptid poetry. Then Christine closes out her two-part series on the Children of Thunder. And how did we get to tectonic plates from here? Tune in to find out... and that's why we drink!

Don't miss out on our spooky fall tour! Get tickets at andthatswhywedrink.com/live
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (em schulz, christine schiefer, Eva gross)
